description: An alchemist with a curious mind, Sucrose is an Anemo catalyst user from Mondstadt who excels at grouping enemies and boosting Elemental Mastery.
info: Sucrose is a 4★ Anemo support who excels at grouping enemies, boosting Elemental Mastery, and enabling powerful Swirl reactions. Build her for Elemental Mastery and Energy Recharge.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Wind Spirit Creation
skills.desc: Performs up to 4 attacks using Wind Spirits, dealing Anemo DMG.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 attacks using Wind Spirits, dealing Anemo DMG.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to deal AoE Anemo DMG after a short casting time.
Plunging Attack
Calling upon the power of Anemo, Sucrose plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all enemies in her path and dealing AoE Anemo DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308
skills.desc: Sucrose hurls an unstable concoction that creates a small Wind Spirit, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and pulling in enemies.
skills.details_html:
Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308
Hurls an unstable concoction that creates a small Wind Spirit, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and pulling in enemies.

skills.name: Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II
skills.desc: Sucrose releases a large Wind Spirit that continuously pulls in enemies and objects, dealing AoE Anemo DMG. The Wind Spirit can absorb Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro and deal additional elemental DMG.
skills.details_html:
Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II
Releases a large Wind Spirit that continuously pulls in enemies and objects, dealing AoE Anemo DMG. The Wind Spirit can absorb Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro and deal additional elemental DMG.

passive_talents.name: Catalyst Conversion
passive_talents.desc: When Sucrose triggers a Swirl reaction, all characters in the party (except Sucrose) gain 50 Elemental Mastery for 8s.

passive_talents.name: Mollis Favonius
passive_talents.desc: When Sucrose hits an enemy with Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 or Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II, increases all party members' Elemental Mastery by 20% of Sucrose's Elemental Mastery for 8s.

passive_talents.name: Astable Invention
passive_talents.desc: When Sucrose crafts Character and Weapon Enhancement Materials, has a 10% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: Clustered Vacuum Field
constellations.desc: Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: Beth: Unbound Form
constellations.desc: The duration of Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II is increased by 2s.

constellations.name: Flawless Alchemistress
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Alchemania
constellations.desc: When Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II absorbs an element, all party members gain a 20% Elemental DMG Bonus for that element for 8s.

constellations.name: Caution: Standard Flask
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Chaotic Entropy
constellations.desc: Sucrose's Normal Attack speed is increased by 10% and she gains 2 additional Elemental Mastery for every party member of the same element.
